Title: The High Road
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Nic Van Zeebroeck, Michael Sopczynski, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: John and Zoe go deep undercover as husband and wife to get close to a person who's been using a dead guy's identity for the past 15 years.
